Reviews.Title: Very bad camera not to mention the bad experience with customer service
Reviews.Author: Erika
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift. The first time my brother used it water leaked in several places in the camera so we either got a defective product, or the product itself does do what it's supposed to. He gave it back to me to return it. First I filed a claim with amazon and they said to contact manufacturer since it was still under warranty. Given it's a Coleman product, I called Coleman ad when I as finally able to go through, they said it was not their product but it was actually manufactured by some else licencing their name. I have tried calling the other company several times and haven't been able to talk to anyone there. At this point, I just feel frustrated of this bad experience with everyone involved. Can someone please help me here? I want my money back so I just need to know where can I ship the defective product to and how's the process to get my refund of the cost + shipping charges.

Reviews.Title: Great gift for kids /teens
Reviews.Author: Marika W.
Reviews.Content: Bought one for both daughters. Never worry about getting banged up or getting wet. Took great pics during our European vacation.

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in anti-shake image stabilization prevents blur without sacrificing image quality.
You will always be able to get the shot you need, no matter how close or far away, and always with the quality you expect.
The generous 2.7-inch Clear LCD display features sharp, natural color that makes it easy to compose shots, read menus, and view photos and videos.
Produce images with an impressive 12.0 megapixel resolution to deliver pictures with true-to-life color and pleasing details. What's more, with this high resolution, images can be significantly enlarged and still look great.
Kit Includes 8GB Micro SDHC Memory Card, Black Digital Camera Case, Floating Wrist Strap and More Bonus Accessories
ProductInfo.Name: Coleman C5WP-BK Xtreme 12MP 33ft. Waterproof Digital Camera Bundle
